name: Slicer
description:
A Figma plugin to make easier to slice multiple objects.

How to use:
1. Run Slicer.
2. Select one or more layers you want to Slice.
3. Choose to set the slice size with padding or total size.
4. Click Slice and the layers will be sliced and grouped.

Feature requests and support:
Feel free to ping me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/exclama
